parameters.name: blobParts
parameters.description: Array of ArrayBuffer, Blob, string, or any typed array. Any other type will be stringified. Strings are encoded as UTF-8.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: `type` represents the MIME type of the blob content. Defaults to empty string.

description: Represents raw data of a given type.

size.description: Size of the blob data in bytes

type.description: The MIME type of the blob data

arrayBuffer.description: Reads the blob data into an ArrayBuffer and returns it in a promise. Each call creates a new in-memory copy of the data.

text.description: Decodes the blob data as a string and returns it in a promise.
